budget.title: Budget-Friendly Journeys
budget.description: Discover unbeatable fares on our extensive network. Busly makes travel accessible without breaking the bank.

network.title: Expansive Route Network
network.description: Connect to over 2,000 destinations across 30 countries. Your next adventure is just a bus ride away.

booking.title: Seamless Booking Experience
booking.description: Book your tickets in seconds with our user-friendly app. Your journey, at your fingertips.

punctuality.title: Punctual Departures
punctuality.description: Time is precious. Count on Busly for reliable schedules and on-time performance.

comfort.title: Comfort is Key
comfort.description: Enjoy spacious seating, onboard entertainment, and complimentary Wi-Fi for a relaxing journey.

eco.title: Eco-Conscious Travel
eco.description: Choose green with our fuel-efficient fleet and carbon offset initiatives. Travel responsibly with Busly.
